text:
Hey everyone! Today we're learning English with 
Dua Lipa and Ellen. By the way, in case you're new

here we help you to learn fast English without 
getting lost, without missing the jokes and

without subtitles. Just like Zainab who says that 
she watches our lessons every day and her English

skills have improved in just three months. So if 
that sounds good to you don't forget to hit that

subscribe button and the bell down below so that 
you don't miss a single one of our new lessons.

Do you find it difficult to understand fast 
speaking natives? Then I highly recommend

our Fluent with Friends Course. In this 48 week 
course you'll learn with the first two seasons

of Friends, you'll receive pdf power lessons 
every week, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community 
and so much more. And did you know you can try it

right now for free with our 3-Part Master class? 
All you have to do is click up here or down in the

description box below to learn more and sign 
up now. We look forward to seeing you there.

If you enjoy learning English with The Ellen 
Show then why not check out our playlist.

You can click up here or down in the description 
box below to choose your next lesson.
